title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S). Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not.
EB: When selecting both P1 and P2, either both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available or neither should be enabled.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Select P1.
2. Select P2.
3. Notice the availability of Open Project and Close Project menu items.
